page.title: 08ECOLOGY - FOOTPATHS
page.content: FOOTPATH 30/60 Felindref to Blaenpant starts near Drysgeirch mill through fields, passing Felindref and woods, around perimeter of Fan Quarry, Meinciau, ends near Blaenpant. FOOTPATH 30/61 Capel Dyddgen to Tycam starts near ruins of chapel along lane, over stile, through disused quarry, over stile, through fields passing Gelligatrog, Laswern and Ynysfach farms, ends near Tycam. FOOTPATH 30/62 Sychnant to Gelligatrog starts on Capel Dyddgen-Llwynbustach road along lane, through pasture fields and rough grazing land, ends at farm. FOOTPATH 30/63 Gwndwnmawr to Footpath 30/62 starts on Mynydd Llangyndeirne road passing Gwndwnmawr, through fields to meet Footpath 30/60.
